explains: n. 疏忽，大意；<法律>玩忽职守
wordGroup: gross negligence 重大过失；严重过失；显著的疏忽

sentences.en: The accident was caused by negligence on the part of the driver.
sentences.cn: 事故是由于司机的过失造成的。

sentences.en: The accident was the result of negligence.
sentences.cn: 这次事故是由于疏忽所致。

sentences.en: The traffic accident was allegedly due to negligence.
sentences.cn: 这次车祸据说是由于疏忽造成的。
